SEARCH
Package org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.spi

Interface SQLExceptionLogging

All Superinterfaces:
org.jboss.logging.BasicLogger
@MessageLogger(projectCode="HHH") public interface SQLExceptionLogging extends org.jboss.logging.BasicLogger
Responsible for logging SQL errors and warnings.
Since:
7
